channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15583] CTAS query removes leading underscore from column names with CBO
item.description:
L209 in PlanModifierForASTConv.java:

      if (colAlias.startsWith("_")) {
        colAlias = colAlias.substring(1);
        colAlias = getNewColAlias(newSelAliases, colAlias);
      }

I would like to explore if we can just remove this limitation.

For instance, due to this issue, when we create a table with Druid storage handler, we need to add an additional underscore for column names as Druid is expecting columns with a certain name.
item.summary: CTAS query removes leading underscore from column names with CBO

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
